alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 21 at 11:12AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest California, including the following county, Southern Los Angeles. * WHEN...Until 400 PM PST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1111 AM PST, Doppler radar indicated heavy showers, and minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hollywood, Universal City, Griffith Park, Beverly Hills, Burbank, Downtown Los Angeles, North Hollywood, Culver City, Inglewood, Van Nuys, Santa Monica, Venice, Encino, Alhambra, Pasadena, Northridge, Torrance, Altadena and Manhattan Beach. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
